id.description: Unique URI used to identify the application or profile

label.description: A short title describing the application or profile

description.description: Longer description of the application or profile

version.description: Version of this profile. Use to keep track of different upstream profile versions.

extends.description: Path to the profile this profile extends, relative to the root of the application.

order.description: Defines the position of this profile in the list of extended profiles. To import a profile right on top of base, i.e. before any other profile, use 1.

depends.description: Lists other profiles this profile depends on to work properly.

ignore.description: List of regular expressions matching relative paths to files, which should not be checked for conflicts. Those files are always overwritten, even if they have local changes.

skip.description: List of regular expressions matching relative target paths to files, which should not be copied into the target application.

skipSource.description: List of regular expressions matching the source path of files, which should not be copied into the target application.

odds.description: List of ODDs used by this profile

landing.description: The HTML page to use as landing page. Will be renamed to index.html. Path is relative to the `templates` subdirectory.

browse.description: The HTML page to use for browse available document collections. Path is relative to the `templates` subdirectory.

media.description: List of output media types supported for display

template.description: The HTML template to use for rendering content pages. Should reside in `templates/pages`

odd.description: The ODD to use if no other is selected

language.description: Default language pre-selected for the app

data.description: Absolute or relative path to the root collection containing all data used by the app.

data-default.description: Absolute or relative path to the collection used for locating XML documents which can be displayed to users. If not specified, defaults to the collection given in `defaults.data`. A relative path will be interpreted relative to `defaults.data`. Use this if documents exposed to users reside in a subcollection below `defaults.data`, but users should not the the subcollection path.

sort.description: The fields to sort by default when displaying list of documents

url.description: URL to link to. Might be null to remove an item inherited from a parent profile.

subitems.description: Secondary menu displayed as a dropdown list. The submenu gets created if the parent item does not have an 'url' property.

url.description: URL to link to. Might be null to remove an item inherited from a parent profile.

enabled.description: If true, the toolbar will be displayed

zoom.description: If true, zoom buttons will be displayed

navigation.description: If true, navigation buttons will be displayed

progress.description: The channel on which the progress bar should listen for updates

enabled.description: If true, the toolbar toggles will be displayed

toggle-reading.description: If true, the toggle to switch on the reading version will be enabled (very plain edited text)

collapse.description: If true, table of contents items will be initially collapsed

enabled.description: If true, the table of contents will be displayed
If true, the metadata block will be displayed in a sidebar
If true, the timeline will be displayed

document-view.description: If true, the timeline will also be displayed in document view. If false, it is only visible when browsing a collection.

enabled.description: If true, the entity register sidebar will be displayed

description.description: Whether to show descriptions in register browse pages or not.

enabled.description: If true, a IIIF viewer will be displayed in the right sidebar.

type.description: Type of the source of the images: either 'iiif' or 'image' (for simple image links not served via IIIF).

base_uri.description: Base URI of the IIIF image API service

milestone_xpath.description: XPath expression to select the milestone elements pointing to images

replace_facs.description: Regular expression applied to the facs attribute of the milestone elements to extract the image identifier

regex.description: Regular expression to match the facs attribute

replace.description: Replacement string for the facs attribute

in-correspondence.description: If true, shows additional navigation for letter exchange between two specific correspondents

enabled.description: If true, the upload form will be displayed

target.description: The target collection to upload documents to

accept.description: The file extensions accepted for uploading

schema.description: The schema to use for the editor

collab.description: Configures the collaboration server for JinnTap

server.description: The server to use for collaboration

docs.description: If true, upload and ODD management will be disabled

body.description: Configures the look of the body element

background-color.description: Background color for the body element

classes.description: Classes to add to the body element. Helps to distinguish between page types in CSS, e.g. 'landing' or 'places'.

logo.description: Configures the logo for the application

image.description: Image to use for the logo. Path should be relative to `resources/css`.

splash.description: Configures the splash image (for the application loading screen)

image.description: Image to use for the splash screen. Path should be relative to `resources/css`.

palette.description: Predefined color palette to use for the application

palettes.description: Registered color palettes to use for the application. Maps palette names to CSS file name.

background-color.description: Main background color of the page. Used for the body element.

menubar.description: Configures the look of the menubar for the application

toolbar.description: Configures the look of the toolbar for the application

max-width.description: Maximum width of the content area for better readability

family.description: Font family for the content area

size.description: Font size for the content area. Use `rem` for relative size.

weight.description: Font weight for the content area. Use `normal` for regular weight, `bold` for bold weight, etc.

family.description: Font family for the base font

size.description: Font size for the base font. Use `rem` for relative size.

line-height.description: Line height for the base font.

weight.description: Font weight for the base font. Use `normal` for regular weight, `bold` for bold weight, etc.

size.description: Font size for headings. Use `rem` for relative size.

weight.description: Font weight for headings. Use `normal` for regular weight, `bold` for bold weight, etc.

size.description: Font size for footnotes. Use `rem` for relative size.
Font size for breadcrumbs. Use `rem` for relative size.
Font size for table of contents. Use `rem` for relative size.
Font size for the menubar. Use `rem` for relative size.

max.description: max length of the breadcrumbs in the toolbar. Longer breadcrumbs will be truncated with an ellipsis.

landing.description: Configures the look of the landing page

hero.description: Configures the look of the hero section for the landing page

background-image.description: Background image for the hero section. Path should be relative to `resources/css`.

background-size.description: Background size for the hero section

background-position.description: Background position for the hero section

background-repeat.description: Background repeat for the hero section

background-color.description: Background color for the hero section

bottom.description: Configures the look of the bottom section for the landing page

background-image.description: Background image for the bottom section. Path should be relative to `resources/css`.

background-size.description: Background size for the bottom section

background-repeat.description: Background repeat for the bottom section

background-color.description: Background color for the bottom section

class.description: Class to add to the main container element of the page

max-width.description: Width of the landing page content column

search.description: Position of the search input on the browse page

toggle.description: If true, add a toggle button to the before sidebar to collapse and expand

hidden.description: If true, the before sidebar will be initially hidden

toggle.description: If true, add a toggle button to the after sidebar to collapse and expand

hidden.description: If true, the after sidebar will be initially hidden

columns.description: Number of columns to display in the registers browse pages

pkg.description: Defines the properties required by eXist's package manager to handle installation

website.description: Website URL on which the application will be hosted or the address of the code repository.

abbrev.description: Abbreviation of the application. Used to identify the application in the package manager and in URLs.

author.description: Main author of the application. Repeatable.

user.description: User credentials for the application. This eXist-db user will own the application code.

generator.description: Expert: XQuery code snippets to use in templates

templating.description: General settings for the templating system. Most settings will only be used in HTML template frontmatter.

extends.description: Path to a template to extend. Used in template frontmatter.

use.description: List of additional template definitions to consult when expanding blocks

modules.description: XQuery modules to make available to templates. The key is the namespace URI of the module.

at.description: Path to the XQuery module to load

prefix.description: Prefix to use for the module

namespaces.description: Namespaces to make available to templates. The key is the namespace prefix, the value is the namespace URI.

custom.description: Custom JavaScript files to load into the application

webcomponents.description: Version of the tei-publisher-components package to use or 'dev' to connect to a development server

extra-components.description: Names of additional components to load from tei-publisher-components

cdn.description: URL of the CDN to use for web components

styles.description: CSS files to load into the application

items.description: Open API specifications to load into the application

spec.description: Path to the OpenAPI specification file

prefix.description: Prefix used for the API endpoints. Should correspond to the XQuery module prefix. If no XQuery module is connected, provide a unique string for the documentation.

id.description: Namespace URI of the XQuery module implementing the API (optional)

path.description: Path to the XQuery module implementing the API (optional)

redirect.description: Adds a redirect to a new page. The key is the source path, the value is the target path.

styles.description: List of styles to load into each static page

collections.description: One or more collections to generate static pages for. The key (might be '') is the collection path relative to the default data collection, the value is a configuration object.

path-prefix.description: Optional prefix to prepend to the output path before the relative collection path

include.description: Optional list of documents to include in the static page. If not specified, all documents in the collection will be included.

paginate.description: How to paginate a document: associates a template with a list of parts to render for each page.

toc.description: If true, a table of contents will be generated for the document.

parts.description: List of parts to render for each page.

id.description: A name for the part. If empty, 'default' is used. Parts will be available in the template in a map called $parts. You can access the part with `$parts?<id>`, e.g. for the default part: `$parts?default`.

template.description: The template to use for rendering the pages
The template to use for browsing the collection

fetch.description: Fetch a resource from an URL and store it

url.description: The URL to fetch. May contain template parameters like [[$context?base-uri]].

copy.description: Copy resources from a path relative to the source collection into a target path in the static collection

from.description: The path to the source collection, relative to the application root

to.description: The path to the target collection, relative to the static output collection

filter.description: Optional filter to apply when copying files

use.description: List of template definitions to consult when expanding blocks

template.description: Pattern to use for URLs as required by pb-page/@url-template

ignore.description: Comma-separated list of parameters to ignore in URLs as required by pb-page/@url-ignore

$replace.description: If true, the object will not be merged with inherited configurations, but simply replace all of them. If an array, only the specified keys will be replaced, the rest merged.
